properties.areaDesc: Michigan City IN to New Buffalo MI; New Buffalo MI to St Joseph MI
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 9 at 2:37AM EST until January 9 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Northern Indiana
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a
Gale Warning, which is in effect from 10 AM this morning to 10 PM
EST this evening. The Small Craft Advisory is no longer in
effect.

* WINDS...South 20 to 30 knots with gusts to 35 knot gales.

* WAVES...3 to 6 feet.
properties.instruction:
A Gale Warning means winds of 34 to 47 knots are imminent or
occuring. Operating a vessel in gale conditions requires
experience and properly equipped vessels. It is highly
recommended that mariners without the proper experience seek safe
harbor prior to the onset of gale conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 10 PM EST THIS EVENING
